    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4

    ValueWithAttributes Privacy

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:Privacy

      • Description

        Allows for control of the sharing of data between parties.

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<Privacy optInDate="2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00" optInStatus="OptedIn" optOutDate="2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00" shareMarketInd="Yes" shareSyncInd="No" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4"/>

      Example JSON

      {
  "Privacy" : {
    "value" : null,
    "shareMarketInd" : "Yes",
    "shareSyncInd" : "No",
    "optInStatus" : "OptedIn",
    "optInDate" : "2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00",
    "optOutDate" : "2011-07-04T14:15:00+06:00"
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        shareMarketInd
        Permission for sharing data for marketing purposes.
        Details
        Type YesNoInherit_Enum
        Example Value Yes
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        shareSyncInd
        Permission for sharing data for synchronization of information held by other travel service providers.
        Details
        Type YesNoInherit_Enum
        Example Value Yes
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        optInStatus
        If present and set to opt out, a customer has explicitly opted out of marketing communication. When set to opt out it overrides the ShareMarketInd.
        Details
        Type OptInStatus_Enum
        Example Value OptedIn
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        optInDate
        The date and time of opt in.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:dateTime
        Example Value 2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        optOutDate
        The date and time of opt out.
        Details
        Type http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema:dateTime
        Example Value 2011-01-24T09:45:00-06:00
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
